ingredients.content: 35 oz oranges, peeled, quartered and seeds removed (approx. 12 oranges)
1 lemon, peeled, quartered and seeds removed (approx. 2 oz)
1 - 2 oz carrots, cut into pieces (approx. 1 in.)
1 - 2 oz celery, cut into pieces (approx. 1 in.)
4 ½ oz red beets, peeled cut into cubes (approx. ½ in.)

preparations.content: Place 17.5 oz oranges into the mixing bowl and blend <b>30 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add remaining 17.5 oz oranges and blend <b>30 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add lemon, carrots, celery, beet and ice cube and chop <b>10 sec/speed 7<b>, then blend <b>2 min/speed 10<b>. Serve immediately.
